page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content: The block covered in this survey was quite varied in many ways as were the participating schools.Stretching as it did from the centre of Worcester, with its concentration of shops and houses, to the sparsely populated area in and around Whittington village.The schools taking part are listed on Page 2 of the text and teachers involved were Mr.D.Holt Head Teacher- Whittington Mr.P.Murphy Dep.H.T.- Cherry Orchard Mr.K.Patterson H.T.- Nunnery Wood Mr.P.J.Wootton H.T.- Stanley Road Pupils-P.Bushell,N.Bampfield,E.Cuddy, L.Curtis,K.Eaves,C.Ellis,S.Evans,L. Goodyear,J.Hall,G.Hudson,E.Kerkhoven, E.Long,A.Mazzei,B.Mills, N.Morris, R.Morris, L.Pearson,A.Warman,T.Lutak, A.Straker,Ka Hoo Kan, Shamin Sarwar, Fiaz Ahmed, Saghir Hussain.
